A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Did Disney buy Rotten Tomatoes too? How did the critics give it such a high score?

Ran on too long. Hack jokes and gags. Ruined "The Force" mythos but not midichlorian bad. Unnecessary characters but not Jar Jar Binks bad. Verbose dialogue\, but not Clone Wars bad. And don't get me started with Leia in space. WTF? Buuuut not as bad as "noooooooo Vader."

To prove I'm not a hater\, I did LOVE Force Awakens. Rogue One was meh. This was pffffllllarrrrrt...

JJ get back in there and clean this franchise up!
